name: Secret in Story
description:
Game Introduction
Accompanied by beautiful piano music, you begin to experience a wonderful love journey. There is no dialogue in the story, only pictures intertwined with montage techniques. Players need to unlock each puzzle to open every door of memory, to find the youth that we have been missing.

Game Features
  • A game with montage techniques
  • Beautiful piano music
  • Challenging puzzles

For more information about our game, you can visit:
https://www.facebook.com/HeroesProductions/
